name: Firefox Web App Manifest File
summary: Learn about .WEBAPP files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Firefox OS is an open source mobile operating system developed by Mozilla. Firefox OS apps are similar to websites or web apps and are built with standard web technologies such as HTML, JavaScript, and CSS. They can be accessed through a web browser and can also be installed on devices for working offline.
The list of web APIs contained within the WEBAPP file allows you to make decisions about apps before installing them. WEBAPP files are necessary in order to publish an app to the Firefox Marketplace.
NOTE: You can scan your WEBAPP manifest file for correct formatting and appropriate values with the Mozilla Web App Validator.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
